name: Supademo
description: Supademo enables businesses to create and share AI-powered interactive product demos to drive engagement and conversions.
longDescription: Supademo is a platform designed to help businesses create interactive, AI-powered product demos and guides that enhance product communication and user onboarding. It simplifies the process of demonstrating product features through a no-code interface, allowing users to record workflows and automatically generate step-by-step demos. Trusted by over 80,000 professionals, Supademo serves product marketers, sales teams, and customer success managers by offering tools to personalize demos, track engagement, and scale onboarding. The platform supports multiple formats, including HTML, screenshots, and videos, and integrates with tools like Help Scout to embed demos in various workflows. Its mission is to streamline product demonstrations, reduce the time spent on manual scripting, and accelerate user adoption by delivering engaging, self-paced experiences. Supademo’s AI capabilities, such as voiceovers and instant translations, make it accessible globally across 15+ languages.
features: AI-powered voiceovers automatically generate synthetic narration for demos, enhancing accessibility and engagement.
Instant translation into 15+ languages allows users to create globally accessible demos with one click.
Dynamic variables enable personalized demos tailored to individual viewers, increasing relevance and conversion rates.
Conditional branching lets viewers choose their own demo journey, improving user interaction and engagement.
Trackable share links provide insights into viewer engagement, helping teams focus on high-potential leads.
Multi-demo showcases allow users to bundle related demos into a single URL or embed for streamlined sharing.
Customizable demo chapters support email lead capture, embedded forms, or password protection for secure access.
Supa Screenshots enable instant creation of professional screenshots via a Chrome extension, simplifying visual content creation.
No-code demo creation allows users to build interactive demos using an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
In-app tour integration lets businesses programmatically trigger demos within their applications to guide users.
Analytics and insights provide detailed metrics on viewer dropoff rates, engagement, and conversion to optimize demos.
Loginless demo creation enables users to start creating demos without signing up, speeding up the onboarding process.

faqs.question: What is Supademo used for?
faqs.answer: Supademo is used to create interactive product demos and guides that help businesses showcase features, drive adoption, and scale onboarding.

faqs.question: Does Supademo offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Supademo offers a free plan with up to five demos and unlimited screenshots, though advanced features require paid plans.

faqs.question: Can Supademo demos be embedded in websites or apps?
faqs.answer: Yes, Supademo demos can be shared as links or embedded in websites, support docs, or in-app modals for seamless integration.

faqs.question: Does Supademo support both HTML and screenshot/video formats?
faqs.answer: Yes, Supademo supports creating demos in HTML for front-end cloning and in screenshot or video-based formats for flexibility.

faqs.question: How does Supademo’s AI enhance demo creation?
faqs.answer: Supademo’s AI automatically generates voiceovers, text annotations, and translations into 15+ languages, making demos engaging and accessible.

faqs.question: Can I track viewer engagement with Supademo?
faqs.answer: Yes, Supademo provides detailed analytics on views, engagement, dropoff rates, and conversions to optimize demo performance.

faqs.question: Is coding knowledge required to use Supademo?
faqs.answer: No, Supademo offers a no-code interface, allowing anyone to create interactive demos using a drag-and-drop system.

faqs.question: Can Supademo be used for in-app product tours?
faqs.answer: Yes, Supademo allows programmatic triggering of demos as in-app modals to guide users through features or onboarding.
